ACACIA

About

Serene and peaceful neighborhood in one of the
most prestigious communities - Dubai Hills Estate, combined with high-class amenities form the uniqueness of this multiple storey residential complex.

About Dubai Hills Estate

Elite location, which gives access to luscious landscaped greens and pristine fairways with an iconic backdrop of the Burj Khalifa and the Dubai skyline. The 2700-acre multi-purpose development includes high-class amenities and infrastructure such as schools, hospitals, parks, malls and even 18-hole Championship golf course.

Reliable developer

EMAAR

Established in 1997, Emaar Properties is the pioneering developer of integrated, master‐planned communities in the UAE and 12 countries around the world.
